title: @Riot Meddler Other than Shen's base stats, what else might happen with Shen buffs?
body: Adjusting {{champion:98}} 's base stats is needed due to the fact that he has low base health for a champion who build full tank. Shen ends up having less health than a bruiser who builds damage. But are you guys looking at anything else in his kit or just tweaking base stats?

replies.body: No current plans for other changes. We'll see what effect the base stats change has at different tiers of play then reassess.
Any chance you could just rename him as Ben or something give him some background as shen's dumber younger brother; and bring old shen back under name shen. Prettty pls. :)

Maybe shen's ad scaling could be increased considering you only build full tank with maybe a titanic hydra in the end. He doesn't do so much damage as other tanks such as sion or darius. Just  a thought.

Wit's End and/or BotRK are both really good on him.

I'd like to see a little more speed on Q's projectile speed or something better on W, personally.

Or maybe make it so that he doesn't go OOE with 2 casts.
